on reading compounds: 周【シュウ】Zhou dynasty (China, approx. 1046-256 BCE), Chou dynasty, perimeter, counter for laps or circuits
周囲【シュウイ】surroundings, environs, circumference
kun reading compounds: 周り【まわり】circumference, girth, surroundings, neighbourhood, neighborhood, vicinity
周りの目【まわりのめ】how others look at you, what others think about you
